content: Built APIs for content management workflow.
Collaborated with frontend engineers to develop server-side solutions.
Developed services to retrieve and send user data to PostgreSQL databases.
Wrote new, and modified existing code using HTML and CSS.
Designed new features and interfaces using Figma.
Customized themes to meet stakeholder requirements.
Introduced new plugins and extensions to make website more usable and interactive.
Gathered and evaluated user requirements in collaboration with product managers and UX researchers.
Developed UI mockups and prototypes for new ideas that clearly illustrated how app will look and function.
Conducted design / layout adjustments based on user interviews and feedback.
Delivered UI specifications, wireframes, and prototypes across product design and engineering teams.
Translated complex designs and wireframes into flexible and usable code.
Delivered resuable components that allowed clients to build on future products more efficiently.
Refactored and optimized older internal code to better optimized and beautiful code.
Delivered multiple email templates that were tested and used across various email clients, campaigns, and projects.
Delivered UI specifications, wireframes, and prototypes across product design and engineering teams.
Collaborated with client managerial and development teams to develop and ship tools for their internal users and customers.
